MemberSignature.Value: public static System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePart SatisfyImportsOnce (this System.ComponentModel.Composition.ICompositionService compositionService, object attributedPart);

.method public static hidebysig class System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePart SatisfyImportsOnce(class System.ComponentModel.Composition.ICompositionService compositionService, object attributedPart) cil managed

Docs.summary: Composes the specified part by using the specified composition service, with recomposition disabled.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Unlike ordinary composition, parts composed with this method are not guaranteed to remain valid if the catalog behind`compositionService` changes.
